data.text: @ThaDevelYouKnow Notice how when I started talking about cults you immediately got lured in to the discussion ?

@JohnRuggedDaDon Uh we feel the same way about you who downplay bad people because you blindly worship the dad that beat you. And you don’t even TRY to tackle problems. Just tinfoil hat mythology and jerking off to flags.
@ThaDevelYouKnow Lol not one of those problems has been solved. Bunch of cultist who eat up everything fed to them by the mainstream media all because orange man bad with mean tweets.
@JohnRuggedDaDon Doing things collectively to get shit done is not cultist. Believing weird things and solving zero real problems, that’s what cultist on the right do.
@JohnRuggedDaDon disbelieving everything you are told isn't free thinking.
@JohnRuggedDaDon Yes I was anti BLM and never wore a mask , yet my heart sings when I see Russian invaders being cooked in their tanks.
@NICHTwissenden @zwickauaktivist Are you for or against communism / socialism?
@zwickauaktivist @JohnRuggedDaDon And than someone shows up, who just thinks that people which are against facism arent against
